name: Healthyfied Steamed Boneless Bangus
description: This 'Healthyfied Steamed Boneless Bangus' is perfect for those looking for a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar meal option. Crafted with health in mind, this recipe aligns with modern nutritional preferences, offering a delicious and nourishing dish that fits seamlessly into a healthy lifestyle.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Boneless Milkfish Belly under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the Garlic and Red Onion, and slice the Tomatoes into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Milkfish Belly with ground Pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the Extra-Virgin Olive Oil in a steamer over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: On the steamer tray, lay out the seasoned Milkfish Belly and top with the chopped Garlic, Onion, and Tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and steam for about 15 minutes or until the Milkfish Belly is fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
